alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 31 at 3:01AM MDT until April 02 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Cascade County below 5000ft, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Hill County and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM MDT this morning. For the High Wind Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. If driving in dense fog, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Western and Central Chouteau County
